description: Topic will vary from year to year- Fall 2004: The Arts of Korea: Introduction to the arts of Korea, with emphasis on ceramics, painting, sculpture, and architecture and additional consideration of metalwork, printmaking, and textile arts. The goal of the course is understanding the development of art in Korea, and the historical, religious, and social contexts in which it flourished. Also for the Fall, with another section code, North and South Korean Political Economies.
name: TOPICS IN KOREAN STUDIES: KOREAN POLITICAL ECONOMY
